title: Ex-Russian spy poisoned by his own front door
text:
Ex-Russian spy poisoned by his own front door 2:26pm IST - 01:05 
Russian former double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter were poisoned with a military-grade nerve toxin that had been left on the front door of their home in England.   
Russian former double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter were poisoned with a military-grade nerve toxin that had been left on the front door of their home in England.  //reut.rs/2J2H27F
